product_name: Screamer Jet Camo Hat - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Earflaps and an inner fleece headband make the Screamer Jet Camo hat a great solution to wintry weather while its earthtones exterior is sure to brighten up cloudy skies. Acrylic knit exterior is soft and breathable; inner fleece headband wicks away moisture and dries quickly to keep you comfortable even when you warm up. Closeout.
short_description: Earflaps and an inner fleece headband make the Screamer Jet Camo hat a great solution to wintry weather while its earthtones exterior is sure to brighten up cloudy skies.
